description: Renovate config for Alfa and related project
* Automerge minor/patch dependencies that pass tests, weekly
* Open PR for other dependencies weekly, grouped together

hostRules.description: Token of a public user with 'Packages:read' permission only, needed due to https://github.com/renovatebot/renovate/discussions/26475

packageRules.description: Update Alfa as soon as a new release is published
Run major update for non-Alfa packages.These are never automerged and require human approval.
Run patch/minor update and automerge them if tests pass.
